synopsis.text: Though he denies the supernatural, high school teacher Park Ja-gi possesses an uncanny ability to predict disasters through his dreams. When he envisions a chilling mass suicide at his school, he embarks on a mission to prevent the impending catastrophe. Along the way, he encounters individuals with unique abilities: Jang Se-yun, who can glimpse 10 minutes into the future, and Kang Min-hyok, who can rewind time by 10 seconds but remains haunted by his failure to save his family. Together, they must unravel the mystery behind the series of suicides and prevent the unthinkable from happening.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
